title: Voice chat
body:
When I connect to voice chat with my friends and for some I cant hear them and i set everything to default but still,
they can hear me but i cant hear them even tho i see they are speaking ( lights up when they speak)

please someone help!

replies.body:
I had to disconnect and re-connect. Hope this helps

https://i.imgur.com/JwSKXMS.jpg

ty but I tried everything now and still cant fix it

maybe my league update patch didnt download correctly idk
ty again for replying

Hey dude - can you check your OS settings and ensure that your default communications device is set to your headset as you expect it? We've run into a problem where that setting is something unexpected, so its trying to broadcast your teammate's voices in a different place from all other sound. We're looking into fixing this confusion in the next few patches so it doesn't catch you by surprise.
